key.name: default-height
key.description: The height that new notes will have upon creation. This will not affect existing notes.

key.name: default-width
key.description: The width that new notes will have upon creation. This will not affect existing notes.

key.name: default-color
key.description: The color that new notes will have upon creation. This will not affect existing notes.

key.name: font
key.description: The font and attributes to use for the note text.

key.name: inline-spell-check
key.description: If true, spelling mistakes are marked with a red underline in the text.

key.name: show-in-tray
key.description: Whether to show a status icon in the tray.

key.name: show-manager
key.summary: Show the manager when the application is started (not in autostart)
key.description: Whether to show the manager when the application is started (not in autostart).

key.name: show-in-taskbar
key.description: Whether to show an entry in the window list and alt-tab.

key.name: autostart
key.description: Whether to start sticky automatically at login.

key.name: autostart-notes-visible
key.description: Whether to show notes when in autostart mode.

key.name: desktop-window-state
key.description: Whether to show the notes on all desktops.

key.name: automatic-backups
key.description: Whether to back up all notes periodically to a separate file.

key.name: latest-backup
key.description: This setting should not be changed directly. It is used solely for internal tracking.

key.name: old-backups-max
key.description: How many backups are preserved. Older ones are deleted. Set to zero to never delete old backups.

key.name: first-run
key.description: This is an internal setting that is used to run certain processes only on the first time running the app.

key.name: disable-delete-confirm
key.description: When set to true, the user is not asked to confirm before deleting a note.

key.name: last-color
key.description: This is an internal setting that is used to track the last used color when cycling colors is active.
